Check if these Website/Landing Page optimizations from the Conversion Report have been implemented in splice-website:

1. **Hero Headline** - Should be "Cut Your Editing Time in Half. Automatically." instead of "The AI Co-pilot for Premiere Pro"
2. **Demo Video** - Should have a real demo video embedded in Hero section (not just placeholder)
3. **Fake Urgency Removed** - Pricing.tsx should NOT have countdown timers or "spots left" fake urgency
4. **SEO Keywords** - layout.tsx metadata should include "auto-cut silence", "podcast editor", "Premiere Pro Plugin"
5. **Annual Default** - Pricing should default to annual billing

Search splice-website/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx, splice-website/src/components/landing/Pricing.tsx, and splice-website/src/app/layout.tsx. Report which are DONE vs NOT DONE with file locations and line numbers.
